title: Sketchbook, "Sketchbook with Views of the Cornish Coastline", after 1878
medium: Graphite, Pen and black ink, and blue colored pencil on cream wove paper (bound)
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Outside cover labeled with artist's name and dates, and location with about seventy-five sketches inside.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook, "Sketchbook with Views of the Cornish Coastline", after 1878.
after 1878. Graphite, Pen and black ink, and blue colored pencil on cream wove paper (bound). Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-88.
